headline: A Look At Otis Worldwide (OTIS) Valuation As Recent Share Price Moves Refocus Investor Attention
summary: Why Otis Worldwide is on investors’ radar today Otis Worldwide (OTIS) is back in focus after recent share price moves, with the stock last closing at US$92.56 and showing mixed short term returns over the past week, month, and past 3 months. See our latest analysis for Otis Worldwide. That recent 1 day share price return of 1.20% sits alongside a 30 day share price return of 4.47% and a 90 day share price return of 4.18%. The 1 year total shareholder return shows a decline of 5.52%, which...
